entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is the one who has Harry in his grip. He is trying to warn Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is trying to loosen Crouch's grip on him and get help from Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who needs to be warned by Harry.

entities.name: weatherby
entities.description: Weatherby is someone who Crouch knows and trusts, as he asks Weatherby to get Dumbledore for him.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who is attending a concert with his wife tonight.

relationships.description: Crouch has Harry in his grip.
Harry is trying to get help from Dumbledore by warning him.
